Package service

Class ReservationService

java.lang.Object
service.ReservationService
public class ReservationService
extends java.lang.Object
Reservation Service class, this class utilizes our Models. Also a Singleton object.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static ReservationService getInstance()

    • addRoom

      public void addRoom​(Room room)
      Puts a new room to room map. Room Number is key and Room is value
      Parameters:
      room - will be used as Value and room.getRoomNumber() is key.

    • getARoom

      public Room getARoom​(int roomNumber)
      Searches roomMap for the corresponding key. If can't find the key will return null
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - Key
      Returns:
      corresponding Room or null.

    • reserveARoom

      public Reservation reserveARoom​(Customer customer, Room room, java.util.Date checkInDate, java.util.Date checkOutDate)
      A new reservation will be created and added to lists
      Parameters:
      customer - object
      room - object
      checkInDate - date in format of "dd/MM/yyyy".
      checkOutDate - date in format of "dd/MM/yyyy".
      Returns:
      new reservation or null if fails to do so.

    • findRooms

      public java.util.Collection<Room> findRooms​(java.util.Date checkInDate, java.util.Date checkOutDate)
      Finds rooms between given dates
      Parameters:
      checkInDate - date in format of "dd/MM/yyyy".
      checkOutDate - date in format of "dd/MM/yyyy".
      Returns:
      new RoomList or null

    • getCustomersReservation

      public java.util.Collection<Reservation> getCustomersReservation​(Customer customer)
      Method to get a customers all reservations.
      Parameters:
      customer - is key in the Map that hold Customer and Reservations.
      Returns:
      A Set of Reservations

    • printAllReservations

      public void printAllReservations()
      Prints all reservations. If no reservation made it'll show corresponding message.
